name: Dimension Harrier
description:
The Dimension Harrier returns to stop an evil tyrant from corrupting the peaceful Land. Deep in cyberspace, after the war of A.D. 6075 is over. 

There is said to be a lost dimension that is home to unspeakable terrors,  unseen wonders and stories that are unlike any other.

Now, with the whole universe as your audience,  a legendary battle that is surely destined to be passed down  to future generations, is about to unfold. 

"Welcome to Dimension Harrier!".

Control: 

MovementKeyFireLeft Mouse, Ctrl (L,R), P, JoyStick 0 ButtonUpArrowUP, WDownArrowDown, SLeftArrowLeft, ARightArrowRight, DPause Game (in Play),
Exit Game (In Menu)ESC

*Remark: You Can use Konami Code in The Menu Title Scene.

W,W,S,S,A,D,A,D,P

To get 3,000 HP Points when Start. 

Play Online: https://dimension-harrier.web.app/

*** Parody Copyright disclaimer, any coincidences with "SEGA" game characters are irrelevant and used for entertainment parody humour purposed.
